actions.text: Amendment (A012) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Hutchinson.
On agreeing to the Hutchinson amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 327 (Roll no. 420).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to ban the use of soft money by national political parties and candidates; index the contribution limits to inflation; and expand the disclosure of campaign finance information.
purpose: An amendment no. 12 printed in H.Rept. 106-311 to ban the use of soft money by national political parties and candidates; index the contribution limits to inflation; and expand the disclosure of campaign finance information.
